TEXT.TITLE: PUBLISHERS EQUIPMENT <PECN>, TRENTONIAN IN DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Publishers Equipment Corp said it reached an agreement to incorporate flexo printing technology into The Tentonian, an Ingersoll newspaper in Trenton, N.J. It said that mid-1988 will be the target date for start-up for the new equipment which will double the size of its present press. Reuter
